text: Ganpat Andhalkar (born 15 April 1935) is an Indian wrestler. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Indian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of India Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for India Category:Asian Games silver medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Ganpat Andhalkar
